meanings.definition: groomers: people who clean and care for animals
meanings.sent1: The groomers at the animal shelter make sure all the dogs are clean and happy.
meanings.sent2: The groomers at the pet spa are experts in keeping pets looking their best.
meanings.sent3: The groomers decided to have a race to see who could clean the most animals in an hour.
meanings.sent4: The groomers' dedication to the animals shines through in their meticulous care.
meanings.sent5: The groomers' gentle touch and soothing words calm even the most anxious pets.

meanings.definition: groomers: people who clean and maintain ski slopes
meanings.sent1: The groomers work tirelessly to ensure the ski slopes are safe and enjoyable for everyone.
meanings.sent2: During the winter season, the groomers are busy smoothing out the snow for skiers.
meanings.sent3: The groomers had a snowball fight after finishing their work on the slopes.
meanings.sent4: The groomers' precision in grooming the slopes is essential for a great skiing experience.
meanings.sent5: The groomers' efforts transform the rough snow into perfectly groomed slopes.

meanings.definition: groomers: tools used for grooming hair or fur
meanings.sent1: The groomers include brushes, combs, and scissors for keeping pets well-groomed.
meanings.sent2: Professional groomers invest in high-quality tools to ensure the best results.
meanings.sent3: The groomers in the salon had a playful argument over which brush was the best.
meanings.sent4: The groomers' tools are like magic wands, transforming messy hair into beauty.
meanings.sent5: The groomers' kit contains everything needed to make pets look their absolute best.
